meta.name: description
meta.value: Best and Worst album dialog for rendering PlayMediaIntent success cases

parameter.name: isDialogDriven
parameter.description: if interaction type is dialog driven

parameter.name: title
parameter.description: Title of the content

parameter.name: artist
parameter.description: Artist for the content

parameter.name: artistSpecified
parameter.description: Artist specified in the intent

parameter.name: isOnShuffle
parameter.description: If the playback is shuffled

parameter.name: isOnRepeat
parameter.description: If the playback is repeating

parameter.name: isTopGenre
parameter.description: If request is for top genre music

parameter.name: isPersonalized
parameter.description: If the resolved content is a personalized entity

parameter.name: isUserPlaylist
parameter.description: If request is for a users playlist

parameter.name: isAppSpecified
parameter.description: if user specified app

parameter.name: isAlgorithmicRadioStation
parameter.description: If the media item type is algorithmicRadioStation

parameter.name: isGrounding
parameter.description: if user grounding is required

parameter.name: isAppAttributionRequired
parameter.description: if app attribution is required

parameter.name: useDialogMemoryForAppAttribution
parameter.description: should app attribution use dialog memory

parameter.name: fallbackUsername
parameter.description: Fallback Username for multiuser

parameter.name: isPlaybackQueueLocationNext
parameter.description: If the playback queue location is next

parameter.name: isPlaybackQueueLocationLater
parameter.description: If the playback queue location is later

parameter.name: device
parameter.description: This still needs support from SKPlatform.

parameter.name: wha
parameter.description: WHA Params

parameter.name: isDecadeStation
parameter.description: If the query is for decade
